xwikidoc.name: ccmArchive20140319
xwikidoc.creator: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #ccm on 19 March 2014
xwikidoc.content: <sdumitriu> has joined #ccm 00:39 <sdumitriu> Hey groundnuty 00:40 <sdumitriu> Those projects are fairly popular, so I guess you'll have to do your best to impress the mentors 00:42 <sdumitriu> A detailed (and correct) architecture shows that you've given serious though to the problem, you understand what needs to be done, and have a good approach to it 00:44 <sdumitriu> A proper timeline shows that you have experience with developing large projects and understand the project development lifecycle, you have experience with the usual roadblocks, etc 00:44 <sdumitriu> ruthgrace: Did you set a root password? 00:50 <ruthgrace> no, not for mysql 00:51 <ruthgrace> @sdumitriu, if I don't have experience developing large projects, am I very unlikely to get in? Asha's project is the only one that looks really cool to me. 00:52 <woohee> has left #ccm 00:54 <sdumitriu> ruthgrace: You don't need to create databases outside MedSavant 00:54 <sdumitriu> Just start the server, then you can create a new database from within the client login screen 00:54 <sdumitriu> It's OK if you don't have experience with big projects 00:54 <ruthgrace> So I can give it any name I want? 00:54 <sdumitriu> Yes 00:55 <ruthgrace> thanks :) I hope Asha and the rest of the mentors reviewing my proposal are OK with it too 00:55 <sdumitriu> One of the goals of GSoC is to give students the oportunity to learn this 00:55 <sdumitriu> So it's not a requirement 00:55 <ruthgrace> That's a relief! 00:55 <sdumitriu> It's just a plus for projects with a lot of proposals 00:56 <ruthgrace> hopefully no one applies to Asha's project. :D 00:56 <ruthgrace> Is the 2-4 student limit for Sick Kids CCM a pretty hard limit? 00:56 <ruthgrace> Or would you guys be willing to take more students than that? 00:57 <sdumitriu> It's not a hard limit 00:58 <sdumitriu> It depends on the combination of students, projects and mentors 00:58 <sdumitriu> 2-4 was originally set when only MedSavant and PhenoTips were considered 00:59 <sdumitriu> But now we also have Quaid's 2 projects, Asha's, and Ron's 00:59 <sdumitriu> So that's 4 more mentors 00:59 <sdumitriu> But we'll see 00:59 <ruthgrace> Sounds great ! 00:59 <sdumitriu> Oh, also, the number of slots that Google gives us 00:59 <ruthgrace> How many is that? 01:00 <sdumitriu> We don't know 01:00 <sdumitriu> It's up to them 01:00 <ruthgrace> I see. 01:00 <ruthgrace> When I try to change my root password, I get this: 01:00 <ruthgrace> sudo mysqladmin -u root password 'ruthspassword' mysqladmin: connect to server at 'localhost' failed error: 'Access denied for user 'root'@'localhost' (using password: NO)' 01:02 <sdumitriu> It's usually -p 01:02 <sdumitriu> Not "password" 01:03 <sdumitriu> And either no space between -p and the password, as in -pruthpassword 01:03 <sdumitriu> Or no password at all, in which case you'll be promted to enter it 01:04 <sdumitriu> Oh, wait, you're tryig to set it, not enter it 01:04 <sdumitriu> Maybe it's already set 01:04 <ruthgrace> I think it worked 01:04 <ruthgrace> I typed in 01:04 <ruthgrace> sudo mysqladmin -u root -p password 01:04 <ruthgrace> and it prompted me for a new password 01:04 <ruthgrace> and to confirm it 01:04 <ruthgrace> well, I'll see if it works with MedSavant in a moment! 01:10 <ruthgrace> Hmmm, I tried connecting to a server, and got an Array Out of Bounds error 01:10 <ruthgrace> and a dialog popped up saying that the log in failed 01:13 <ruthgrace> Do you get this error if you try to make a new database? 01:14 <ruthgrace> ERROR org.ut.biolab.medsavant.client.view.list.ListView - Unable to load list. 01:15 <sdumitriu> I think that error was fixed earlier today 01:15 <sdumitriu> Try to pull changes and rebuild 01:24 <ruthgrace> Thank you! It's not having the array out of bounds exception any more. I'm still not able to log in, though 01:34 <ruthgrace> hey, its a null pointer exception ! 01:34 <ruthgrace> 2014-03-19 01:34:02,438 3552 [AWT-EventQueue-0] INFO org.ut.biolab.medsavant.client.login.LoginController - Starting session... java.lang.NullPointerException at org.ut.biolab.medsavant.client.login.LoginController.finishLogin(LoginController.java:130) 01:52 <ruthgrace> Maybe because I didn't open the ports 02:06 <ruthgrace> No, I think the ports are being used by MedSavant 02:09 <ruthgrace> Do I need a special user name and password? 02:09 <ruthgrace> that's different from my root mysql credentials? 02:09 <ruthgrace> (to log into the MedSavant client) 02:10 <sdumitriu> Hm, hold on 02:10 <sdumitriu> Are you using mysql or mysql-ib? 02:10 <sdumitriu> mysqladmin will set the mysql password 02:10 <sdumitriu> Those are different things 02:11 <ruthgrace> oh. ICE is using mysql-ib, right ? 02:11 <sdumitriu> Different servers running on different ports 02:11 <sdumitriu> Yes 02:11 <sdumitriu> Not sure if it has a mysqladmin-ib utility or not... 02:15 <ruthgrace> there is this: 02:15 <ruthgrace> /usr/local/infobright-4.0.7-x86_64/bin/mysql_secure_installation 02:15 <ruthgrace> that lets you set the root password 02:23 <sdumitriu> Yes, I used that myself 02:30 <ruthgrace> I think I had set it before but didn't run sudo updatedb ... I am silly. 02:31 <ruthgrace> Aw, the log in is still failing, though. 02:32 <ruthgrace> I tested the ports and was able to echo back and forth from the server/client. Hmm. I'll figure it out later. Thanks sdumitriu! and good night. 02:37 <Shubham1> has joined #ccm 02:38 <Shubham1> Hi ! 06:42 <CARAM> has joined #ccm 06:56 <groundnuty> sdumitriu_[Away]: pity, I hoped that a complicated topic would scare off most of the people 07:01 <groundnuty> sdumitriu_[Away]: anyway, thank you for your time 07:22 <SayAsh_> has joined #ccm 10:43 <punnu> has joined #ccm 10:44 <nairboon> has joined #ccm 12:51 <Shubham2> has joined #ccm 14:54 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 14:54 <Shubham> Hi ! 15:08 <ruthgrace> has joined #ccm 15:12 <Shubham> anyone ? 15:28 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 15:42 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 15:55 <sdumitriu> Hi Shubham 16:06 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 16:35 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 16:36 <Shubham> sdumitriu there ? 16:36 <sdumitriu> Yes 16:36 <Shubham> I wanted you to have a look at my proposal and suggest some changes that I can make. 16:37 <Shubham> I dropped a mail to Quaid and Shankar but haven't received any reply yet. 16:37 <Shubham> BTW this is the first draft. 16:37 <sdumitriu> Right 16:51 <ruthgrace> has joined #ccm 17:06 <ruthgrace> has joined #ccm 17:13 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 17:52 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 19:49 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 19:58 <Shubham> has joined #ccm 20:05 <tweety098> has joined #ccm 22:13 <Shubham> has joined #ccm
